<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.76</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Roads and Airports </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all map airports, both static and dynamic </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allAirports''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [staticAirports, dynamicAirports], where:
* staticAirports [[Array]] of [[Number]]s - static airports IDs
* dynamicAirports [[Array]] of [[Object]]s - dynamic airports objects (such as "DynamicAirport_01_F" found on aircraft carrier)  </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allAirports = [[allAirports]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[airportSide]], [[setAirportSide]], [[land]], [[landAt]], [[assignToAirport]], [[Arma: Airport IDs]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
